729514f-a.title: Richmond: Richmond Terrace - Arlington Avenue
729514f-a.text:
3260 Richmond Terrace, adjoining the S. E.
corner of Arlington Avenue, showing the Captain
Garrett Post House (Beers's 1874 map). From 1907
to 1017 it belonged to J. Sterling Drake. The
viee is westard.
September 28, 1924
By tm. T. Davis through P. L. Sperr
NO RECRODUCT1ONS
